document_title: Is vegetables stuck to the edges dangerous? Causes, signs, prevention
subsection_content: Placenta accreta or placenta accreta is a condition in which the edge of the placenta is close to the edge of the uterine opening. When the cervix is ​​open, the edge of the placenta can be felt. It can be seen that placenta previa clinging to the edge is a warning sign of the possibility of semi-central and central placenta previa. Therefore, when diagnosed with placenta accreta, pregnant mothers need to strictly follow the doctor's examination schedule and rest instructions to avoid dangerous complications. (2)
subsection_title: rau bam mep.json. What is verruca?
subsection_data:
rau bam mep.json. What is verruca?
Placenta accreta or placenta accreta is a condition in which the edge of the placenta is close to the edge of the uterine opening. When the cervix is ​​open, the edge of the placenta can be felt. It can be seen that placenta previa clinging to the edge is a warning sign of the possibility of semi-central and central placenta previa. Therefore, when diagnosed with placenta accreta, pregnant mothers need to strictly follow the doctor's examination schedule and rest instructions to avoid dangerous complications. (2)
